title: Set a Product as Featured on Homepage
description: A merchandiser wants to feature a new, high-margin product in the 'Featured Products' section of the homepage.

tasks.description: Identify the product to be featured.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent selects the correct product SKU.

tasks.description: Add the product to the 'Homepage Featured' collection.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the product to the special collection that populates the homepage section.
